txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the pillagers to get away ([placeholder]/10)</rgb>

Men of Harad have sent their Mûmakil towards the towers of Minas Tirith. Although they cannot damage the wall directly, they afford Southron archers and warriors a better foothold into our defences.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat Mûmakil that have wandered near the tower
* Repel the Haradrim forces in the tower
* Keep injured soldiers alive
* Protect food-stores
Defeat the Mûmakil and repel the Southrons in the tower
Defeat the Mûmakil and repel the Southron attack.
